example.com/printversion v0.1.0

-- .mod --
module example.com/printversion
-- .info --
{"Version":"v0.1.0"}
-- README.txt --
There is no go.mod file for this version of the module.
-- printversion.go --
package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"os"

	"example.com/version"
)

const v = "v0.1.0"

func main() {
	fmt.Fprintf(os.Stdout, "example.com/printversion %s\n", v)
	fmt.Fprintf(os.Stdout, "example.com/version %s\n", version.V)
}
